resources.string: Download large files (over %d MB) faster by using Wi-Fi and 4G networks at the same time. Note that depending on the statuses of networks, Download booster may use only Wi-Fi or 4G networks to download files.

Download large files (over %d MB) faster by using Wi-Fi and 4G networks at the same time. Note that depending on the statuses of networks, Download booster may use only Wi-Fi or 4G networks to download files.
